<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Mercy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2350)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 74

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This porcelain or alabaster mask portrays an angelic visage of kindness and mercy. The mask grants a +1 item bonus to [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=612)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You are about to roll a variable number of Hit Points you restore from an action with the [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) trait;  **Effect** Roll twice to determine the number of Hit Points you restore and take the higher result.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mask of Mercy
